word:
When these men entered upon this work, they did not foresee the results, but step by step has been taken under the generalship of satanic agencies, who knew from the beginning what the results would be. Had they kept in touch with the divine Character, they would not have done the work they have done, but while at Minneapolis they both closed their eyes to the 


                                    -182- 

light and padlocked their hearts against evidence, in order that the Holy Spirit might not find entrance; and their course has testified to the result.
